page.title: 13EDUCATION A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: This morning I woke up at eight o'clock and I got dressed and had my breakfast.Then I walked to school and went in. We started with Reading Routes. During this time some children went over to the School Hall to play recorders. After this I went out to play. After play we did mental arithmetic followed by mathematics. At twelve o'clock I went over to the School Hall for dinner. After lunch I read my reading book. I went over to the School Hall to help yhe playgroup. I sang songs from a book called "Singing Together". It is a radio programme. After that I did some topic work and then our teacher read us a story. At three o'clock I went home. I walk home. It takes me about fifteen minutes.
